    Title: GriddedSurfFromSimpleFaultData

      protected GriddedSurfFromSimpleFaultData(LocationList faultTrace, double aveDip, double upperSeismogenicDepth, double lowerSeismogenicDepth, double maxGridSpacingAlong, double maxGridSpacingDown)
      Deprecated. 
      This constructor will adjust the grid spacings along strike and down dip to exactly fill the surface (not cut off ends), leaving the grid spacings just less then the originals.
